column2: application seeking to  set aside the  order of the  Learned  High Court Judge dated 29.09.2016.At
the  stage of the  argument  it  was  agreed  by  both  parties  to  file  written submissions  on  the  legal
ground  of the  requirement  of exceptional  circumstances,  before  granting  bail,  as  envisaged  by
the Poisons, Opium and Dangerous Drugs Ordinance was demonstrated.
